basics.name: Jooyoung Yoo
basics.label: Master's student in Spatial Data Science Program, USC.
basics.summary: Computer Vision, Spatial Data Science, GeoAI

highlights: Truck, Homeless Encampment, Electric Vehicle projects

publications.name: Truck Detection and Counting in Low-Light Condition: Do We Need Infrared Camera?
publications.publisher: In 2024 IEEE International Conference on Big Data and Smart Computing (BigComp) , 2024
publications.summary: A study comparing models trained on infrared imagery with those trained on regular imagery, demonstrating superior performance of the infrared-trained models in nighttime environments.

publications.name: Development of a New Pedestrian Avoidance Algorithm considering a Social Distance for Social Robots
publications.summary: This article presents a new pedestrian avoidance algorithm for social robots that clusters pedestrians based on gait characteristics to define social distances, integrates this model with existing navigation algorithms, and shows through simulations that it reduces pedestrian stress without increasing travel time.

publications.name: Examining the socialization of grit and the effects of peer community and teacher closeness using longitudinal social network analysis
publications.publisher: Korean Association For Learner-Centered Curriculum And Instruction
publications.summary: This study reveals that elementary students' grit is influenced by peer communities, forming friendships based on similar grit levels, while teacher closeness shows no significant effect on their grit development.

skills.name: Data Science
keywords: - R for Longitudinal Social Network Analysis (SIENA)
- SPSS and MPLUS for SEM (Structural Equation Modelling) Research Methodology
